abstract: An internal analysis conducted by Johnson & Johnson in 2011 after it recalled a troubled hip implant projected that the all-metal device would fail within five years in nearly 40 percent of patients who received it.
snippet: An internal analysis conducted by Johnson & Johnson in 2011 after it recalled a troubled hip implant projected that the all-metal device would fail within five years in nearly 40 percent of patients who received it.
lead_paragraph: An internal analysis conducted by Johnson & Johnson in 2011 after it recalled a troubled hip implant projected that the all-metal device would fail within five years in nearly 40 percent of patients who received it.

headline.main: Projection of Hip Implant Failure Rate
